attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current tarrif for speeding convictions is out of all proportion to the 'crime'. To accumulate 12 points and loss of a licence is ridiculously easy. Therefore I petition the Prime Minister to remove points as a penalty from all speeding convictions upto 10 miles an hour over a limit of 30 mph and 40 mph and upto 20 mph over a limit of 50 mph, 60 mph and 70 mph.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
